TopicTitle: Camera control lost after LoadScene from VAB

Articles.Content:
Upon execution of HighLogic.LoadScene(GameScenes.TRACKSTATION); from the VAB scene and then switching to any vessel, the flight camera can no longer be dragged around by right-click, or arrow keys. I've pretty much lost all control of the camera. I can switch to different camera modes and so, but the normal camera control is just gone. Fixes itself upon restart.

Any ideas?
